metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12458 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The nlm_swap_auxiliary_headers_in function in bfd/nlmcode.h in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heap read via a crafted nlm file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29.1-1ubuntu1').
